title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 50 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 50 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: The mighty God, even the LORD, hath spoken, and called the earth from the rising of the sun unto the going down thereof.
lineList.cn: （亚萨的诗）大能者神耶和华，已经发言招呼天下，从日出之地到日落之处。

lineList.en: Out of Zion, the perfection of beauty, God hath shined.
lineList.cn: 从全美的锡安中，神已经发光了。

lineList.en: Our God shall come, and shall not keep silence: a fire shall devour before him, and it shall be very tempestuous round about him.
lineList.cn: 我们的神要来，决不闭口。有烈火在他们面前吞灭，有暴风在他四围大刮。

lineList.en: He shall call to the heavens from above, and to the earth, that he may judge his people.
lineList.cn: 他招呼上天下地，为要审判他的民，

lineList.en: Gather my saints together unto me; those that have made a covenant with me by sacrifice.
lineList.cn: 说，招聚我的圣民到我这里来，就是那些用祭物与我立约的人。

lineList.en: And the heavens shall declare his righteousness: for God is judge himself. Selah.
lineList.cn: 诸天必表明他的公义。因为神是施行审判的。（细拉）

lineList.en: Hear, O my people, and I will speak; O Israel, and I will testify against thee: I am God, even thy God.
lineList.cn: 我的民哪，你们当听我的话。以色列阿，我要劝戒你。我是神，是你的神。

lineList.en: I will not reprove thee for thy sacrifices or thy burnt offerings, to have been continually before me.
lineList.cn: 我并不因你的祭物责备你。你的燔祭常在我面前。

lineList.en: I will take no bullock out of thy house, nor he goats out of thy folds.
lineList.cn: 我不从你家中取公牛，也不从你圈内取山羊。

lineList.en: For every beast of the forest is mine, and the cattle upon a thousand hills.
lineList.cn: 因为树林中的百兽是我的，千山的牲畜也是我的。

lineList.en: I know all the fowls of the mountains: and the wild beasts of the field are mine.
lineList.cn: 山中的飞鸟，我都知道。野地的走兽，也都属我。

lineList.en: If I were hungry, I would not tell thee: for the world is mine, and the fulness thereof.
lineList.cn: 我若是饥饿，我不用告诉你。因为世界，和其中所充满的，都是我的。

lineList.en: Will I eat the flesh of bulls, or drink the blood of goats?
lineList.cn: 我岂吃公牛的肉呢。我岂喝山羊的血呢。

lineList.en: Offer unto God thanksgiving; and pay thy vows unto the most High:
lineList.cn: 你们要以感谢为祭献与神。又要向至高者还你的愿。

lineList.en: And call upon me in the day of trouble: I will deliver thee, and thou shalt glorify me.
lineList.cn: 并要在患难之日求告我，我必搭救你。你也要荣耀我。

lineList.en: But unto the wicked God saith, What hast thou to do to declare my statutes, or that thou shouldest take my covenant in thy mouth?
lineList.cn: 但神对恶人说，你怎敢传说我的律例，口中题到我的约呢。

lineList.en: Seeing thou hatest instruction, and casteth my words behind thee.
lineList.cn: 其实你恨恶管教，将我的言语丢在背后。

lineList.en: When thou sawest a thief, then thou consentedst with him, and hast been partaker with adulterers.
lineList.cn: 你见了盗贼，就乐意与他同夥，又与行奸淫的人，一同有分。

lineList.en: Thou givest thy mouth to evil, and thy tongue frameth deceit.
lineList.cn: 你口任说恶言，你舌编造诡诈。

lineList.en: Thou sittest and speakest against thy brother; thou slanderest thine own mother's son.
lineList.cn: 你坐着毁谤你的兄弟，谗毁你亲母的儿子。

lineList.en: These things hast thou done, and I kept silence; thou thoughtest that I was altogether such an one as thyself: but I will reprove thee, and set them in order before thine eyes.
lineList.cn: 你行了这些事，我还闭口不言。你想我恰和你一样。其实我要责备你，将这些事摆在你眼前。

lineList.en: Now consider this, ye that forget God, lest I tear you in pieces, and there be none to deliver.
lineList.cn: 你们忘记神的，要思想这事，免得我把你们撕碎，无人搭救。

lineList.en: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.
lineList.cn: 凡以剐谢献上为祭的，便是荣耀我。那按正路而行的，我便使他得着我的救恩。
